name: Silver-tone crystal belt
description: Chainmail has always been Paco Rabbane's signature and something Julien Dossena continues to pay homage to in his collections for the brand. This slinky belt is frosted with scores of glistening stones nestled in silver-tone settings. Wear yours around the waist of party dresses.

name: Boyfriend croc-effect leather belt
description: Rag & bone's 'Boyfriend' belt has been made in England from glossy croc-effect leather in a timeless black shade. Designed with a gold buckle, it's the perfect width to loop through your favorite jeans. Match your accessories to the polished hardware.

name: Leather belt
description: Versace's Spring '20 show garnered the media's attention not least for Jennifer Lopez's iconic jungle-print dress, but because the collection was a celebration of the house's legacy. The accessories line marked the occasion with updated gold hardware in the form of a baroque 'V'. Centered with the emblem, this slim belt has been made in Italy from white leather.

name: Woven leather belt
description: It takes over 100 steps to make one of Anderson's beautifully crafted belts. This one has been meticulously handwoven from slender strips of burgundy leather. It fastens with a shiny buckle - the gold tone will glow against soft neutral shades like cream or beige.

name: Croc-effect leather belt
description: Made in Italy by the hands of an artisan, Anderson's belt has gone through over 100 crafting steps from start to finish. It's cut from grey croc-effect leather and adorned with an ornately engraved silver buckle.

name: Annabelle Swiss-dot tulle-trimmed straw hat
description: From the Resort '20 collection, Eugenia Kim's 'Annabelle' hat is woven from lightweight straw in a classic wide-brimmed shape - perfect for keeping your face out of the sun on your next city break. It features an elegant Swiss-dot tulle ribbon around the crown that forms an oversized bow. A discreet adjustable strap ensures a seamless fit.

name: Printed silk visor
description: Fendi's sleek visor has been made in Italy from silk emblazoned with the label's instantly recognizable 'FF' logo. It has a padded browband for comfort, an elasticated band at the back and ties that can be fastened into a bow.

name: Ribbed striped wool-blend beanie
description: GANNI's beanie is knitted from a naturally insulating wool-blend with brown, pink and yellow stripes. It has a ribbed finish and rolled cuff featuring the Copenhagen label's logo appliqué. Wear it with the coordinating scarf on particularly chilly days.

name: Janine leather and faux fur earmuffs
description: Eugenia Kim's chic 'Janine' earmuffs keep you extra warm without messing up a fresh blowout. They're made with a smooth white leather headband and have cozy faux fur tufts. Keep them in a tote in case of cold winds during commutes or vacationing in the Alps.

name: Crystal-embellished mesh and mohair beret
description: Jennifer Behr is endlessly inspired by vintage headpieces - this beret looks like something you'd have seen on a stylish woman in the '50s. Crafted by hand in the brand's workshop, it's made from soft mohair and has a mesh veil dotted with shimmering crystals. The elasticated edges ensure it will stay perfectly place over straight or tousled hair.

name: Ostra leather shoulder bag
description: Carolina Santo Domingo believes your handbag should always be the perfect finishing touch. This 'Ostra' style has been made in Italy from smooth tan leather and has a sculptural crescent-moon shape. The adjustable handle means you can slip it over your shoulder or carry it as a tote.

name: Balloon small leather bucket bag
description: Drawing on Loewe's leather heritage, the label's new 'Balloon' bag is made from panels of supple hide, each hand-cut and then assembled in a sculptural bucket silhouette. Debuting on the Spring '20 runway, it secures with a knotted drawstring and has plenty of space inside for essentials. Attach the longer strap to carry yours over the shoulder.

name: The Shoulder Pouch leather bag
description: Daniel Lee's arrival at Bottega Veneta has made it one of the most buzzed-about brands of the moment, so it's no surprise he scored prizes at this year's Fashion Awards. Made in Italy from supple leather, this bag is carefully gathered along the sides to create a slouchy, cloud-like shape. It's perfectly sized to drape over one shoulder.

name: Nolita medium quilted leather shoulder bag
description: Saint Laurent's 'Nolita' bag is a classic style you'll turn to season after season. Made in Italy from buttery soft leather, it's detailed with chevron stitching and a tonal version of the house's iconic logo plaque. The slouchy silhouette boasts enough room for your day-to-day essentials, plus a tablet or book. Double-up the sliding chain strap for a shorter drop.

name: Lou studded zebra-print calf hair and leather shoulder bag
description: SAINT LAURENT's 'Lou' bag channels fashion's unwavering love of animal prints thanks to the zebra-striped panel of calf hair at the front. It's been made in Italy from smooth brown leather and has a soft detachable tassel. Match any jewelry to the gold 'YSL' plaque.

name: Fringed two-tone wool cape
description: Johnstons of Elgin's cape feels just like wrapping up in a big soft blanket, and it's chic enough for a weekend getaway in the country. It's been spun in the house's legendary Scottish atelier from smooth camel and navy wool and has fringed edges. Cinch yours with a belt on windy days.

name: two-tone silk-twill scarf
description: Natalie Karlsson and Karin Bylund founded lescarf to create versatile scarves that can be styled countless ways for every season. This 'No. 10' version is made from lustrous silk-twill in a black and white palette and features the house's moniker at the corners. Loop it around the handle of your favorite tote or wear it as a neckerchief.

name: Printed silk-twill scarf
description: Alexander McQueen's square scarf showcases the contrast of darkness and romance that the brand's founder was known and loved for. It's been made in Italy from crisp silk-twill emblazoned with the house's 'Endangered Flower' print, which includes flowers, chains and a signature skull.

name: Neon printed silk-twill scarf
description: Valentino's scarf is saturated in a neon-yellow hue that's surprisingly easy to style - pair it with neutral tones or all-black outfits. It's printed with the brand's distinctive 'V' motif and made from lightweight silk-twill. Wear yours wrapped around a ponytail, slipped through your belt loops or knotted at your neck for an instant pop of color.

name: Printed silk-twill scarf
description: Versace's scarf can be looped around a low ponytail, your neck or the handles of a tote, but our favorite has to be the first option. It's been made in Italy from crisp silk-twill patterned with the house's revived 'Jungle' print, as modeled (again) by Jennifer Lopez at the Spring '20 show. The brand's logo lettering also appears in monochrome.

name: Nanette leather platform ankle boots
description: Grenson updates its iconic 'Nanette' boots with a chunky platform sole and copper eyelets. Just as light and comfortable as the original, this pair is made from smooth black leather with a hiking-inspired lace-up front. Wear them the same way every editor and influencer is right now - with a floral midi dress or straight-leg jeans.

name: Ledyland suede over-the-knee boots
description: Stuart Weitzman's 'Ledyland' boots are the latest addition to the brand's cult over-the-knee styles and we're confident they'll be just as big a hit as the iconic 'Lowland' ones. Crafted in Spain from buttery black suede, they have an almond toe and 90mm block heels that are balanced by discreet 15mm platforms. Wear yours with everything from mini dresses to skinny jeans.

name: Denvee suede knee boots
description: Our buyers loved Isabel Marant's combination of barely there shorts and Western boots on the Spring '20 runway. This knee-high 'Denvee' pair is made from soft beige suede and set on low stacked heels. Perfect for summer festivals, you could also team them with a mini dress and fringed bag.

name: Demka eyelet-embellished textured-leather ankle boots
description: Isabel Marant's 'Demka' boots have a Western meets rock 'n' roll feel. They've been made in Italy from textured cream leather in a cowboy-inspired silhouette embellished with silver eyelets and set on manageable 75mm heels.

name: Shelby embroidered satin-paneled textured-leather ankle boots
description: Sophia Webster's 'Shelby' ankle boots resemble Western styles except with the brand's signature playful touch. This point-toe pair is made from textured-leather and designed with embroidered satin butterflies. The stacked Cuban heel adds just the right amount of lift. Wear yours with cropped denim.

name: Woven leather sandals
description: Porte & Paire's sandals meticulously meld current trends and timeless designs. This pair is made with slim strips of leather that are woven to create a cage-effect at the square toes and wrap around the ankles for a customized fit. The 60mm block heels and cushioned insoles ensure comfort.

name: Woven leather sandals
description: Porte & Paire's sandals meticulously meld current trends and timeless designs. This pair is made with slim strips of leather that are woven to create a cage-effect at the square toes and wrap around the ankles for a customized fit. The 60mm block heels and cushioned insoles ensure comfort.

name: Woven metallic leather sandals
description: Porte & Paire's sandals meticulously meld current trends and timeless designs. This pair is made with slim strips of leather that are woven to create a cage-effect at the square toes and wrap around the ankles for a customized fit. The 60mm block heels and cushioned insoles ensure comfort.

name: Leather sandals
description: Porte & Paire's sandals are made from thin strips of black leather, forming a caged silhouette that's supportive, minimal and sleek. They have sculptural 90mm heels and square toes - one of this season's most popular footwear shapes.

name: Marmont logo-embellished leather sandals
description: This pair of Gucci's 'Marmont' sandals has been made in Italy from 'Hibiscus' leather that's smooth and supple. They're embellished at the toe strap with the label's signature interlocking gold 'GG' plaque and set on sturdy block heels. The coolest way to style them for Spring '19 is with a tailored short suit.

name: Jolie leather-trimmed embellished logo-detailed canvas slides
description: Gucci's 'Jolie' slides are such a chic option for warm days - you could wear them by the pool on vacation, but our stylists also like them with relaxed tailoring. Trimmed with black leather, they have a quilted canvas strap woven with the house's 'GG' logo and are topped with gold hardware.
materials: Beige and dark-brown canvas, black leather (Calf)

name: Valentino Garavani Rockstud leather sandals
description: Valentino Garavani's sandals are decorated with the label's signature 'Rockstud' embellishments, which are applied by hand and galvanized to retain their shine. This pair has been made in Italy from smooth tan leather and has three slim straps plus a toe loop.

name: Leather mules
description: In just a few brief seasons, Bottega Veneta's square-toe styles have reached nearly the same hype levels as the house's 'intrecciato' weave - it's a huge testament to Daniel Lee's ambitious approach. Subtle and elegant, these mules have been made in Italy from versatile sand leather and have sculptural 100mm stiletto heels.

name: Hiking leather sandals
description: GANNI’s chunky sandals have black leather straps decorated with the brand's logo in cream. They fasten with Velcro® at the ankle and have a comfortable molded footbed. Style yours with everything from mini dresses to flared pants.

name: Tequila 105 crystal-embellished suede sandals
description: Aquazzura's 'Tequila' sandals have been updated in supple black suede - making them the LBD of your shoe collection. Made in Italy, they're playfully embellished with chunky crystals along the straps. Show yours off with shorter hemlines.

name: Belle Vivier suede and mesh pumps
description: Roger Vivier's signature 'Belle Vivier' pumps come in myriad colors, but this pair is a wise choice for Spring '20 - the neutral antique-rose hue will go with practically everything. Made in the label's Italian atelier from suede and mesh, they have a signature square toe and buckle embellishment, just like the original version from the '60s.

name: Belle Vivier two-tone patent-leather pumps
description: Creative Director Gherardo Felloni has kept the silhouette of Roger Vivier's 'Belle Vivier' pumps as is, recognizing them as a true classic. This pair is made from two-tone patent-leather and features the iconic oversized buckle atop a squared toe and cube heel. Wear them comfortably day or night.

name: Belle Vivier two-tone patent-leather pumps
description: Roger Vivier's pumps are named after the 1967 movie Belle de Jour, in which French actress Catherine Deneuve wore a similar pair by the brand - it marked the debut of the now-signature oversized metal buckle. Made in Italy from glossy patent-leather, they're set on a sculptural block heel and have a square toe.

name: 85 leather pumps
description: Gianvito Rossi's supple leather pumps are a staple you shouldn't be without. The neutral hue and mid-heel make them a chic choice for day or night. Wear yours with an oversized jacket and skinny pants, or style them for dinner with a printed dress.

name: 85 suede pumps
description: Gianvito Rossi's suede pumps are revered for their timeless silhouette. Expertly crafted in Italy, this versatile navy pair can easily be worn to complete both day and evening looks. Pair them with denim for a casual spin.

name: Pleated cotton-blend poplin shirt dress
description: Our buyers are seriously championing the shirt dress this season and Valentino's iteration is at the top of their wish list. The first look to appear on the Spring '20 runway, modeled by Adut Akech, it's been made in Italy from crisp cotton-blend poplin in an elegant wrap silhouette and flows to a sharply pleated midi skirt. Take styling cues from the show and cinch the shape in at the waist with a rope belt.

name: One-shoulder stretch-knit midi dress
description: Daniel Lee says his job is to make Bottega Veneta part of the fashion conversation, while staying true to the label's heritage - the result is beautifully made clothes that are directional, yet effortless to wear. The opening look on the Spring '20 runway, this stretch-knit midi dress has an asymmetric neckline and low scooped cutout at the back. Echo the show by wearing it with a chunky chain necklace and mules.

name: Cold-shoulder cotton midi shirt dress
description: Brandon Maxwell reinterprets the classic shirt dress in such a fresh, artful way for Spring '20. This style is cut from off-white cotton and has a cold-shoulder neckline and flattering nipped-in waist. The puffy sleeves and softly pleated skirt create beautiful volume. Take your cue from the runway and leave a few lustrous buttons undone.

name: Tiered gathered leather maxi dress
description: Precision and handwork are what guides Loewe's Jonathan Anderson. Worn on the Spring '20 runway - and one of our buyers' favourites from the season - this tiered maxi dress has been crafted in Spain from buttery leather. It's gathered around a diamond at the V-shaped bodice and has an artfully pleated dropped waist. Wear yours to special events with gold hoops and strappy sandals.

name: Skorpio draped cutout open-back hammered-satin gown
description: It's the combination of liquid-like fabric and masterful draping that makes Rick Owens' 'Skorpio' gown so flattering. Cut from grey-green hammered-satin, it skims over the body and has a cowl neck, open back and cutouts at either side of the waist to reveal a glimpse of skin as you move. Complement the dusty hue with a smoky eye.It's the combination of liquid-like fabric and masterful draping that makes Rick Owens' 'Skorpio' gown so flattering. Cut from grey-green hammered-satin, it skims over the body and has a cowl neck, open back and cutouts at either side of the waist to reveal a glimpse of skin as you move. Complement the dusty hue with a smoky eye.

name: Filis belted silk crepe de chine mini dress
description: Silvia Tcherassi's Resort '20 moodboard is filled with photos of Chile's Atacama Desert - the designer is inspired by the landscape's rich colors and natural sand formations. Made from silk crepe de chine, this 'Filis' mini dress has a waist-cinching belt and flouncy, ruffled hem. Echo the brand's styling and wear it with a beaded bag.

name: Wiggle ruched stretch-velvet midi dress
description: Receiving a standing ovation at New York Fashion Week, Christopher John Rogers' whimsical Spring '20 show was loaded with vivid, eye-catching color - Rihanna's already a fan, and wore this 'Wiggle' dress to an event recently. It's cut from vibrant coral stretch-velvet and ruched to flatter your curves. The bandeau bodice is supported by internal gumming, but it comes with optional straps if you'd prefer.

name: One-sleeve asymmetric embellished cady mini dress
description: Stella McCartney's mini dress passed the NET SUSTAIN test with flying colors. It's made from white cady blended with FSC-certified viscose and has an asymmetric hem. Match your jewelry or eyeshadow to the serpentine hardware.
materials: 52% viscose, 45% acetate, 3% elastane; fabric2: 100% polyamide; lining: 100% silk

name: Lace and gauze-trimmed cotton-poplin mini shirt dress
description: Self-Portrait embraces this season's shirt dress trend with this cotton-poplin version that's trimmed with delicate lace and gauze for a feminine spin. It has a loose fit and falls to a mini skirt that's fully lined to ensure coverage. Wear yours with heels or emulate the runway styling with ankle boots.
materials: 100% cotton; trim1: 65% polyamide, 35% cotton; trim2: 100% polyamide; lining1: 100% cotton; lining2: 100% polyamide

name: Bahia gathered cotton mini dress
description: Jacquemus' Spring '20 runway conjures up images of sun-drenched vacations, which is exactly the kind of setting you'd expect to wear this alluring 'Bahia' dress. Modeled after trending shirt dress styles, it's cut from lightweight cotton that's subtly scored with stripes and has a plunging neckline and gathered waist. Wear yours with strappy sandals and statement earrings.

name: Button-embellished metallic wool-blend jacquard mini dress
description: Gucci's wool-blend mini dress has been jacquard-knitted in Italy with the house's iconic 'GG' monogram in gold. Designed in a retro shift silhouette, it's decorated with sizable mother-of-pearl buttons along the shoulders and detailed with two convenient slip pockets at the front. Wear yours with knee boots.

name: Paneled cotton-poplin, ribbed jersey and canvas mini dress
description: Alexander Wang's mini dress is cleverly designed to look like a separate skirt and top pulled together by a wide canvas belt. The ribbed jersey bodice has a mock neckline and curved seams and the floaty cotton-poplin skirt moves beautifully as you walk. Style yours with chunky sandals and a structured tote.

name: Valensole off-the-shoulder pleated stretch-knit maxi dress
description: Jacquemus' Spring '20 show was held in the middle of a lavender field in Provence, France - the summery setting was such a perfect backdrop for the romantic collection. A standout on the bright-pink runway, this off-the-shoulder dress is made from stretch-knit in a sunshine yellow hue and designed for a figure-hugging fit. It falls to a maxi hem that's pleated to create beautiful movement and volume.

name: Padma gathered color-block jersey gown
description: London's Serpentine Gallery provided the perfect backdrop for Roksanda's art-inspired Spring '20 show - the colors referenced Christo and Jeanne-Claude's installation 'The Floating Piers'. Spliced together from panels of ochre, camel and blush jersey, this gown is gathered along the V-neckline and sweeps dramatically to the floor. It'll move so fluidly as you walk.

name: Valensole off-the-shoulder pleated stretch-knit maxi dress
description: Alexander McQueen's Spring '20 collection celebrates everything Sarah Burton cares about the most - craftsmanship, storytelling and community spirit. Worn on the runway in Paris, this dress is made from cotton-blend corded lace, inspired by endangered blooms the designer and her team discovered on a research trip to London's Kew Gardens. We think it's a suitably romantic choice for a midsummer wedding.
materials: 82% cotton, 18% polyester; trim: 100% polyamide; lining: 74% acetate, 26% silk

name: Pussy-bow silk blouse
description: There's an air of romance to Valentino's blouse, thanks to the floaty silhouette, covered buttons and blouson sleeves. It's been made in Italy from 'Powder Green' silk and has long pussy-bow ties at the neck.

name: Bow-detailed draped silk-blend satin blouse
description: As seen on Gucci's Fall '19 runway, this loose-fitting blouse has been made in Italy from lustrous silk-blend satin and has a sizable velvet bow brooch. Tuck it into a heritage skirt, leaving the pleated panel to drape elegantly at the front.

name: Rey tie-detailed gathered silk-twill blouse
description: TOVE takes inspiration from the irrefutable link between strength and beauty. Part of the Spring '20 collection, this 'Rey' blouse is cut from silk-twill and gathered at the neckline to create a voluminous silhouette. Wear your hair up or over one shoulder to accentuate the graceful tie at the back.

name: Super Eight floral-print ramie blouse
description: Made from eco-friendly ramie, Zimmermann's blouse stays true to the brand's bohemian identity. It's printed all over with wallpaper-inspired vintage florals - the same kind the founder saw while sifting through old Super Eight movies for this collection. The clean, high neckline and covered buttons give it a '60s look.

name: Super Eight floral-print ramie blouse
description: TOVE'S 'Wren' blouse is cut from chocolate silk-georgette that's softly gathered to create a floaty drape. It has balloon sleeves and a high neck that ties at the back. Wear yours with relaxed tailoring.

name: Off-the-shoulder floral-print silk-satin twill top
description: Mother of Pearl's off-the-shoulder top is made from silk-satin twill printed with vibrant, life-like flowers. It has a slim silhouette and billowy, elasticated sleeves with sweeping ties at the cuffs. The built-in bra offers light support. Wear yours with jeans or the coordinating pants.

name: The Tuxedo ruffled grosgrain-trimmed crinkled cotton-voile blouse
description: Inspired by vintage tuxedo shirts, The Great's blouse has scalloped ruffles and grosgrain trims along the yoke. It's cut from airy crinkled cotton-voile for a loose fit and has voluminous sleeves emphasized by button-fastening cuffs. Wear yours to brunch with jeans and mules.

name: The Tuxedo ruffled grosgrain-trimmed crinkled cotton-voile blouse
description: Ditte Reffstrup says most of the florals in GANNI's Spring '20 collection are interestingly blurred. Printed with watercolor-style blooms and painterly swirls, this top is made from floaty plissé-georgette and has a lettuce hem. It's ruffled at the cuffs and collar.

name: Leone draped crinkled silk-satin top
description: London-based label TOVE's dedication to fabric is clear to see in this 'Leone' top - the fluid shape and softly draped cowl neck perfectly complement the crinkled silk-satin. This slightly loose piece has straight sleeves and rouleau buttons at the back. Wear it as part of a relaxed evening outfit with these pants from the same collection.

name: Paisley-print fil coupé silk-blend georgette blouse
description: Etro's Resort '20 collection is partly inspired by Berber jewelry, which explains the luminous pops of color on this blouse. Cut from silk-blend georgette, it's patterned with the brand's signature paisley and metallic fil coupé flowers. Underpin the sheer fabric with a camisole, and tuck the curved hem into tailored pants or jeans.

name: Jada satin midi skirt
description: Stine Goya's Pre-Spring '20 collection draws inspiration from Giuseppe Verdi's renowned opera Aida, and this richly hued 'Jada' skirt certainly brings a sense of theatrical drama. Cut from fairly weighty crimson satin with a lovely sheen to it, this A-line style is spliced with a slit at the front.

name: Champion ruffled embroidered shell maxi skirt
description: Rick Owens' admiration for Champion dates to the '70s - worn by his older cousins, memories of seeing the athletic brand's logo for the first time influenced the one he hand-drew for his own label. The collaborative collection is inspired by archival styles and Egyptian silhouettes. This maxi skirt is made from shell and embroidered with both labels' monikers.

name: Bar silk-satin midi skirt
description: Anine Bing’s 'Bar' skirt is made from lustrous burgundy silk-satin that's cut on the bias for a beautiful drape. It has an elasticated band that sits comfortably at your natural waist and skims the thighs before gently flaring out at the hem. Wear it with a half-tucked sweater and tonal knee boots.

name: Isla satin maxi skirt
description: Paris Mitchell Temple and Georgia Cherrie spend a huge amount of time researching and developing their own fabrics - the satin used to make this 'Isla' slip skirt is specially designed to be structured but fluid, so it doesn't cling. Cut in a column silhouette, it fastens with a faux pearl button and falls to a subtly tiered hem. Style yours with the matching blouse and mules.

name: Pleated stretch jacquard-knit midi skirt
description: Proenza Schouler's stretch skirt is jacquard-knitted with an abstract print that's meant to resemble tiger stripes. It's pleated throughout to create movement as you walk and has an elasticated, high-rise waistband. Wear it with all-black pieces to balance the boldness.

name: Pleated printed crepe skirt
description: Since his appointment as Creative Director, Riccardo Tisci has set about redefining Burberry's house codes with a contemporary twist. This skirt is printed with contouring 'Icon' stripes - a fresh interpretation of the label's heritage check - which lend a sporty tone to the feminine silhouette. It's cut from lightweight crepe pressed with sharp pleats.

name: Pillar stretch cotton-blend cloqué midi skirt
description: The sculptural shape of Rick Owens' 'Pillar' skirt is accentuated by the unique fabric it's made from - a crisp, textured cotton-blend cloqué with a touch of stretch. The wrap-effect slit at the back makes it easy to walk in

name: Silk-satin midi skirt
description: Le Kasha designs coordinating pieces that can be worn together or as separates, like this midi skirt, which looks so elegant worn with the matching top. It's cut from pastel-pink silk-satin and drapes beautifully.

name: James lace-trimmed washed silk-satin mini skirt
description: Fleur du Mal's ready-to-wear designs are just as feminine and chic as the brand's popular lingerie. This 'James' skirt is cut from washed silk-satin for a figure-skimming fit and falls to a split mini hem that's trimmed with delicate lace. When you're not wearing it at home with the matching camisole, style it with a blouse and sandals for nights out.
materials: 100% silk; trim: 60% cotton, 20% elastane, 10% polyamide, 10% polyamide organza

name: Layered paisley-print crepe skirt
description: Showcased on JW Anderson's Spring '20 runway in London, this skirt was styled with the coordinating blouse, evoking a sense of romance and wanderlust. It's cut from crepe printed with paisley blooms and falls in flouncy layers, creating a handkerchief hem. Match your shoes to the black trims.

name: Oversized cotton-blend gabardine blazer
description: The Attico gives tailoring a vibrant update for Spring '20 with this cobalt-blue oversized blazer. It's been made in Italy from cotton-blend gabardine and makes for an amazing head-to-toe look when styled with the matching pants.

name: Oversized cotton-blend gabardine blazer
description: Masculine-meets-feminine tailoring has been a part of Stella McCartney's collections since the very beginning. This blazer is cut from slightly stretchy wool-blend twill and has a relaxed silhouette that nips in at the waist. Treat the soft blue hue as a neutral - it'll look just as good with beige and tan as it will against darker shades.

name: Oversized cotton-blend gabardine blazer
description: Peter Do's tailored clothes have been spotted on editors and street style icons at countless events, including Fashion Week. One of the designer's signature silhouettes, this slightly loose blazer is updated for the spring season in powder-blue cady. It has an asymmetric buttoned front and sharp lapels. Wear it as a suit with the matching pants.

name: Oversized cotton-blend gabardine blazer
description: Impeccable tailoring has been a part of Alexander McQueen's DNA ever since Lee showed his very first tuxedo jacket in 1992 - Sarah Burton now interprets the brand's calling card with softer silhouettes, still equally as powerful. This blazer is cut from grain de poudre wool for a slim fit, and has padded shoulders and a nipped-in waist to create an hourglass shape. Wear it with the matching pants, or a T-shirt and jeans for more casual occasions.

name: Appliquéd crepe blazer
description: Gucci's blazer features two major trends for the upcoming season - sharp suiting and monochromatic color palettes. Tailored in Italy from ivory crepe, it's appliquéd with tonal cording and has polished gold buttons. Wear yours with the brand's matching pants and pussy-bow blouse.
materials: 97% viscose, 3% elastane; fabric2: 69% acetate, 19% cotton, 8% polyester, 4% polyamide; trim: 58% polyester, 42% acetate; lining: 100% silk

name: Pinstriped wool maxi skirt
description: Wright Le Chapelain's collection of pinstriped wool separates prove that tailoring remains just as huge this season. This maxi skirt is fitted through the waist and hips and has a deep front slit for ease of movement. Wear yours with the matching vest.

name: Belted woven blazer
description: The dusky palette of Salvatore Ferragamo's Resort '20 collection is inspired by the desert of New Mexico, where designer Paul Andrew enjoys visiting each year. This collarless woven blazer is made from stretchy antique-rose fabric in a slightly loose silhouette, and has padded shoulders and a sweeping sash belt to cinch the waist. Wear it with the matching pants.
materials: 96% viscose, 4% elastane; buttons: 100% horn (Buffalo); lining: 100% cotton

name: Belted wool-blend twill blazer
description: MATERIEL's Spring '20 lineup is packed with fresh colors, like the 'Poppy' hue of this blazer. Tailored from wool-blend twill, it has padded shoulders and a nipped-in waist that's emphasized by the cool double belt. Wear yours with jeans or equally vivid pants.

name: Convertible woven blazer
description: Like so many of the brand's pieces, Tibi's blazer can be worn more than one way - simply detach the coordinating scarf for a more pared-back finish. It's tailored from a smooth woven fabric in a versatile mushroom hue and has padded shoulders and functioning buttoned cuffs. Style yours with the matching 'Sebastian' pants or jeans depending on the occasion.

name: Woven blazer
description: Peter Do typically sticks to neutrals for his signature tailoring, but he was inspired by modern art and brilliant sunrises to put a pop of color into his palette for Spring '20. Part of the lineup, this woven red blazer is sharply cut with notched lapels and has padding in the shoulders to balance the nipped in waist. Style yours as a suit with the matching pants.

name: Woven tapered pants
description: Peter Do finds inspiration for his Spring '20 palette in artworks by Mark Rothko and Ellsworth Kelly, who are known for their use of bold colors. Part of the lineup, these vibrant red woven pants are tailored for a slim fit with tapered legs. They have a high-rise waist and slits at the cuffs. Style yours as a suit with the matching blazer.

name: Appliquéd crepe wide-leg pants
description: Gucci's pants are appliquéd with woven cord along the sides that highlights the sleek, wide-leg silhouette. This high-rise pair has been tailored in Italy from ivory crepe and falls to an ankle-grazing hem. Wear yours to the office with the matching blazer and pumps.

name: Ubaia cotton-blend tapered pants
description: Isabel Marant's 'Ubaia' pants were first spotted on the Spring '20 runway, modeled by '90s super Eva Herzigova. Cut from Lyocell and cotton-blend, they have an ultra high-rise waist and a loose fit through the legs that taper towards the ankles. Emulate the show styling by wearing yours with heels and the matching vest.

name: Cropped broderie anglaise cotton-trimmed crepe wide-leg pants
description: Lela Rose incorporates so many feminine details into each piece - these pants are trimmed with scalloped broderie anglaise along the cropped hems. Seen on the label's Spring '20 runway, they're made from navy crepe in a wide-leg slhouette and have a flattering high-rise waist. Wear them with a tucked-in blouse and lace-up sandals.

name: Pleated silk-blend satin slim-fit pants
description: SAINT LAURENT's Resort '20 collection is modeled on Yves' own Moroccan uniform from back in the day. These pants have been made in Italy from silk-blend satin and pleated throughout to really highlight the fabric's luster. They're high-waisted and have slim-fitting legs that'll look great with brogues or point-toe pumps.

name: Katina tie-detailed pleated wool-blend tapered pants
description: It's the details that make Andersson Bell's 'Katina' pants stand out among the season's neutral tailoring - the braided belt draws the eye to the high-rise waist and the slim ties at the ankle create a tapered effect. They're made from a versatile beige wool-blend in a relaxed silhouette that's enhanced by pressed pleats. Wear them with the label's shirt and square-toe mules.

name: Nembo linen and silk-blend twill wide-leg pants
description: Max Mara's 'Nembo' pants have been tailored in Italy with wide legs that'll look so elegant pooling over sandals. They're cut from airy linen and silk-blend twill, which is perfect for the warmer months. Tuck an oversized sweater into the artfully pleated waistband.

name: Leather leggings
description: Ambre Dahan's contemporary brand SPRWMN - pronounced "Superwoman" - designs incredibly comfortable second-skin leggings. Handmade from naturally stretchy leather, this pair has a high-rise elasticated waistband for a flexible fit and hits right at your ankle. Style them with a chunky cardigan and sneakers.

name: Demitria grain de poudre wool-blend straight-leg pants
description: Part of our capsule collection focusing on the pieces that'll work really hard in your wardrobe, Theory's 'Demitria' pants are made from grain de poudre wool-blend. They have universally flattering straight legs accentuated by pressed pleats. Wear yours with mules and the matching blazer to the office..

name: Halluana stretch-crepe flared pants
description: When Safiyaa founder Daniela Karnuts was starting out, she wanted to create a label filled with timeless designs that were worthy of capsule status - considering these 'Halluana' pants are in our edit in nine other colors, we think she's ticked that box. Made from stretch-crepe, they're cut for a slim fit and kick out to flared hems. Style them with the matching top or a white pussybow blouse.

name: Kingston lace-up fold-over high-rise tapered jeans
description: Ulla Johnson's 'Kingston' jeans are a brilliant example of the designer's ability to twist the classics. In line with this season's utility trend, they're cut from panels of stonewashed denim and have a folded waistband to enhance the high-rise silhouette. Lace-up ties at the cuffs create an exaggerated tapered shape. Style yours with a tucked-in sweater or blouse.

name: Monmar tapered jeans
description: IRO's 'Monmar' jeans not only look chic, the paper-bag waist and tapered legs mean they're super flattering, too. Made from sturdy white denim, the distinctly '80s silhouette makes them a solid investment for Spring '20. Wear yours with other neutrals.

name: Yasmin belted high-rise straight-leg jeans
description: Reformation's Yael Aflalo takes inspiration from '70s style icon Bianca Jagger, as well as the closets of Hanneli Mustaparta and Miroslava Duma. These 'Yasmin' jeans are cut from blue denim and have a belted, paperbag-effect waist. The straight legs make them an instant classic.

name: Playback Kut Up distressed high-rise straight-leg jeans
description: Ksubi's 'Playback' jeans have become a cult style, thanks to their impeccable fit - Hailey Bieber and Kendall Jenner are just a couple of celeb fans. This updated 'Kut Up' pair is made from rigid stonewashed denim that's artfully distressed with softly frayed hems and ripped knees. They're cut for a high-rise, straight-leg fit. Wear yours with a tucked-in tank and ankle boots.

name: Halluana stretch-crepe flared pants
description: When Safiyaa founder Daniela Karnuts was starting out, she wanted to create a label filled with timeless designs that were worthy of capsule status - considering these 'Halluana' pants are in our edit in nine other colors, we think she's ticked that box. Made from stretch-crepe, they're cut for a slim fit and kick out to flared hems. Style them with the matching top or a white pussybow blouse.

name: Gloria belted high-rise tapered jeans
description: Isabel Marant Étoile's collections often feature '80s-inspired silhouettes, but these 'Gloria' jeans feel completely fresh, thanks to the super slouchy shape. Made from washed denim that's accented by tobacco stitching, they have a high-rise paperbag waist and tapered legs. Wear yours with a tucked-in shirt and cowboy boots.

name: Paneled high-rise slim-leg jeans
description: The ribbed panels spiraling Mugler's jeans are reminiscent of the label's corsets, a longtime signature of the house. Washed in a fresh blue hue, they're cut to sit high on your waist and fit slim through the legs. Style yours with a structured jacket and pumps.
materials: 98% cotton, 2% elastane; pocket lining: 80% polyester, 20% cotton

name: Repu cropped belted acid-wash high-rise tapered jeans
description: IRO's 'Repu' jeans are designed with sizable front ties that accentuates the flattering high-rise waist. Acid washed for a vintage look, they're pleated at the hips for a relaxed fit and fall to tapered, cropped cuffs. Wear yours with a tucked-in sweater and ankle boots.

name: Noelle cropped high-rise wide-leg jeans
description: Khaite's 'Noelle' jeans have cuffed wide legs reminiscent of '90s styles. They're made from ivory denim and have a high-rise waist finished with a signature lacquered button. Wear yours with slingbacks and a tonal sweater.

name: Karolina frayed high-rise skinny jeans
description: The best jeans feel like you've worn them forever, like GRLFRND's 'Karolina' pair. Made from premium denim, they sit high on the waist and fall to skinny legs with frayed cuffs. The faded 'Feel Right' wash looks best with distressed or vintage tees.
